Index >  IfAutoFeed

IfAutoFeed

Description

Returns or sets whether to enable the Data Source's automatic document feeding process.

Data type

bool

Default value

true

Syntax

.IfAutoFeed = true;

Remarks

Set this property after OpenSource() and before AcquireImage().

If the value of this property is true, the Data Source will automatically feed the next page from the document feeder after the previous page is acquired.

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.

See also

IfFeederEnabled
IfFeederLoaded
IfPaperDetectable
XferCount
